short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculates price per oz on popular fragrance discount websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds much needed functionality to discount fragrance websites. You can see the price/oz on each item listing to see how much you're really paying.Currently, this extension only supports fragrancex, but the developer plans to support the major discount sites that lack this functionality.
